rumorList.text: Flint invented the gun.
Flint is descended from werewolves.
Flint is obsessed with finding a way to visit Innistrad.
Flint is a great shot with a gun.
Flint is a loyal companion.
Hertarza's father is a powerful position in the thieves guild.
Hertarza graduated school only because of her family's power and influence.
Hertarza's mother left her father to join a demon cult.
Hertarza's mother is actually a crazy scientist performing terrible experiments on living beings.
Hertarza's father was really murdered by Zolona because they were in love but he angered her.
Bevan is an alcoholic and cannot be trusted around hard liquor.
Bevan feels no remourse when it comes to children, and will not bat an eyelash about killing them
Bevan is a true 40 year old virgin, and has no plans on changing it anytime soon.
Although Bevan manipulates most of who he encounters, and does it well, he has a massive soft spot for the poor, weak, and elderly, and will usually sacrifice more than he should to help others out.
While Bevan despises the life his father lived, he can't control himself when it comes to delivering a killer blow, and will do everything in his power to get a fix.
Suna has a rare illness that causes wild magic to errupt.
Suna is not a quick thinker, she thinks thoroughly about actions and does not do well within the heat of the moment.
Suna is being followed by evil dream spirits; they cause fear and nightmares to those dreaming around them, meaning these ill effects follow Suna and those around her.
Suna believes strongly in not harming others unless necessary.

Suna saved a nearby village by using "shape water" to deliver water to them during a drought. She believed she had done it anonymously but its hard to miss blue glowing eyes in the middle of the night.
Despite many experiences to the contrary Griselda believes that she was born out of a hole in the ground which she lovingly refer to as my "hobbit hole", this is due to a certain friend's influence.
Griselda was in charge of the nursery unit when the senior cleric took the day off.
Griselda's strange beliefs and habits are often exemplified in the fact that she eats dirt..
Griselda will rarely return things she has borrowed, unless reminded frequently.
Griselda is farrrrrrrrr too eager to help those in need and can be very easily manipulated.
Malacus lives with his parents still.
Malacus has been using performance enhancing substances.
Malacus has trouble reading letters and failed out of wizard school because of it.
Malacus was a math-lete before he got into "proper athletics".
Malacus used to moonlight as a taxi driver (carts, chariots, and carriage.
